name: jvvK
title: console に画像とか出す
description:
Chrome のコンソールまたは Firebug で画像が出ます

2013/4/15 リンク追加

  • Firebug Tip: Styled Logging | Software is hard
  • Using the Console - Chrome DevTools — Google Developers

js.content:
console.image = (img) ->
  if typeof img is 'string'
    image = document.createElement 'img'
    image.src = img
    image.onload = ->
      console.image(image)
    return
  if 'canvas' of img
    img = img.canvas
  if img instanceof HTMLCanvasElement
    src = img.toDataURL()
  else
    src = img.src
  console.log '%c', """
    background-image: url('#{src}');
    font-size: 0;
    line-height: #{img.height}px;
    padding: #{img.height / 2}px #{img.width}px #{img.height / 2}px 0;
  """

console.qr = (text, size=128) ->
  console.image("http://chart.apis.google.com/chart?chs=#{size}x#{size}&cht=qr&chl=#{encodeURIComponent text}")

console.tex = (text) ->
  console.image("http://chart.apis.google.com/chart?cht=tx&chl=#{encodeURIComponent text}")
    
    
# see your console
# 非同期なので順番が狂う……
